column2: select top # haloid , lastprogenitorid, mainleafid, m_crit2#, d.np from MR d where snapnum = # -- reshift = # and firsthaloinfofgroupid = d.haloid -- centers of FOF groups and m_crit2# between # and # order by newid () -- random sub sample) select d.haloid as d_id, d.m_crit as d_mass, d.np as d_np , p.* from descendants d inner join MR p on p.haloid between d.haloid and d.lastprogenitorid order by d.haloid, p.haloid
